price: i drugih koristi od nje imaju, i mlijeko, pa zašto nisu zahvalni,
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
